tours.name: Sloth Watching Tour
tours.description: Observe Costa Rica’s most iconic animal — the sloth — in its natural habitat. A peaceful, educational wildlife experience perfect for families and nature lovers.
tours.longDescription: Join our naturalist guide for a relaxed walk through one of La Fortuna’s best sloth habitats. Spot both two- and three-toed sloths, learn about their behavior, ecology, and how they survive high in the rainforest canopy. Along the trail, you may also encounter colorful birds, butterflies, and other local wildlife. A must-do experience for wildlife enthusiasts and photographers.
highlights: Guided walk through natural sloth habitat
Perfect for families and all ages

tours.name: Night Walk in the Rainforest
tours.description: Discover the magic of the rainforest after sunset. Spot frogs, insects, reptiles, birds, and other nocturnal wildlife with a professional naturalist guide.
tours.longDescription: As night falls, the rainforest transforms into an entirely different world. This guided Night Walk gives you the chance to observe Costa Rica’s vibrant nocturnal wildlife — including tree frogs, snakes, insects, owls, and more. Equipped with flashlights, your guide will reveal the sounds, secrets, and behaviors of nighttime creatures. An unforgettable experience ideal for nature lovers and curious travelers.

tours.name: La Fortuna Waterfall Adventure
tours.description: Descend 500 steps to reach the breathtaking La Fortuna Waterfall. Swim in its crystal-clear pools and explore hidden viewpoints surrounded by lush rainforest.
tours.longDescription: Discover one of Costa Rica’s most iconic natural wonders. After a scenic descent to the base of the waterfall, enjoy a refreshing swim and capture unforgettable photos of the turquoise pool. Your guide will also reveal the area’s fascinating geology and local flora.
schedule: 08:30 AM - Arrive at La Fortuna Waterfall entrance
09:00 AM - Guided descent and free time for swimming
whatToBring: Water shoes or sandals with grip
